=== Current Issues ===

Screen resolution is set to a 4x3 mode by default (change resolution to 1280x800 manually under System-Preferences-Display).

Sound muted at 50%. Helped a little by turning Front Speaker Volume to 100% in gnome-volume-control (ref:<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/pulseaudio/+bug/192040/comments/12|Bug #192040]]</nowiki>
